title: Can't login game client

replies.body: Hey Porocles thanks for attending to my comment. I solved it but I had to factory reset my mac and only then I was able to pass through the "error" message. I don't know what caused the error to come again but it is kinda scary if this happens again and I have to factory reset mac again in the future.

Download the Hextech Repair Tool and make it do a clean uninstall and reinstall.

That's what I recommend, at least.
The HRT won't be able to perform a solid repair if he's already installed the updated client, since it's currently most compatible with the legacy version.

Oh, okay. I didn't know that. I haven't used it in some time though, so yeah that's good to know. Does that mean there might be a new HRT some day? Because it's saved my rear in the past and I'd be sad to see it gone.
Already did that  and I tried reinstalling everything again but error update was showing again.{{item:3073}}

Thanks for trying!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you individually with this.  I know you're getting an error making attachments, but don't worry our tech team will assist.  We'll reply back asap!

It sounds like you've got a series of issues here ranging from a bad install of the updated client to connection problems failing to patch you up.  Your install sounds like it's become corrupt and in this case a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) should fix it up.  Before doing so, I recommend running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, because these errors are suggesting a failure to reach our patching servers.  That should fix you up!
